mapper.sql: select distinct r.role_id,r.role_name,r.data_scope,r.description,r.create_by,r.create_time,r.update_by,r.update_time,r.enabled from sys_role r left join sys_role_user ru on ru.role_id = r.role_id left join sys_user u on u.user_id = ru.user_id left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id
mapper.insert: insert into sys_role(role_name, description, enabled) values (#{roleName}, #{description})
mapper.update:
update sys_role r
`role_name` = #{roleName},
data_scope = #{dataScope},
description = #{description},
where r.role_id = #{roleId}
